lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: The money I'm lending is little more than pocket change to me, but deployed through the micro-lenders, it makes a real difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who lend large amounts of money to companies in the United States.

lenders.name: Rick Hargett
lenders.loan_because: As a serial entrepreneur, I understand the passion and risk it takes to launch and grow a new business. Raising funds can be quite difficult, I am happy to help.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I am tentatively hopeful that Kiva is back on track with no massive rounds of expiries and unhelpful, grumpy email responses.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I'm a single parent. I know what it's like to try to make ends meet,but I still have so much more than these people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that sells RVs (recreational vehicals). I clean them inside and outside. I also drive the company car to pick up parts and other things.

lenders.name: Chin-An
lenders.loan_because: I believed in them and because I think they need more than I do.  I hope this will make a difference in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a good job, I love my work.  I work behind a desk in front of a computer.  I consider I am very lucky.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: ...its a good thing to do :)
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise a team of people who take calls for various non-profit organizations in the USA who accept donations by telephone.

lenders.name: Pastor Shane
lenders.loan_because: God so loved the world that He gave His only son Jesus that whosoever believes in Him should not perish but have everlasting life.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve as Director of Ministry for a Global Prayer request ministry.

lenders.name: Sybrand
lenders.occupational_info: Developing production processes for vaccines that are produced on a mammalian cell line.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I did a report on Togo in elementary school. I'd like my future grandchildren to write about Togo's growth and economic prosperity. Helping one person at a time to be more financially responsible and a meaningful contributor to Togo's economy may just be a stepping stone in the right direction.
lenders.occupational_info: Bad things happen when good people do nothing. I am a teacher and strive to lead by example in this case by doing small things in hopes that they lead to greater things.

lenders.name: David Lauri
lenders.loan_because: my uncle Bill did -- he thought helping people, not just family but others around the world, was important.
lenders.occupational_info: I use computers to help people share information.

lenders.name: P-Chan
lenders.loan_because: I visited Vietnam in 2006 and I saw how hard it is to make a living over there.  I also have family in Vietnam and I want to help those that I can.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer systems.

lenders.name: Jose A
lenders.loan_because: Fostering the entrepenur spirit is the most effective mechanism available to control poverty while promoting freedom. Join us in the lending group "Invisible Hand" if you share this view.

lenders.name: Onno
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people with small sums of money.

lenders.name: Michelle & Ian
lenders.loan_because: We were inspired by Kiva's mission and became aware of it through a piece viewed on PBS.  What a noble and wonderful way for people to help one another!
lenders.occupational_info: Ian works in finance as a fund manager for a large global bank.  Michelle is carrying their first baby and will take on the role of parent in July.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: The money goes out, it does some good, and it gets paid back. Then it can go out again. Really, I don't lose anything, and the people who are helped by it stay standing on their own two feet -- it's a loan, not a handout. There's some pride there that shouldn't be given up.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach music to children -- mostly how to play classical western music instruments, but sometimes just what music is and how to listen and describe it. I currently live in Winner, South Dakota, and teach a fifth grade band, a sixth grade band, a junior high band, and a high school band.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I want to support other women who would like to be in business for themselves but have fewer opportunities than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I write activities and background material for science (and other) textbooks. I also weave, knit, act, and dance.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe its an efficient method to provide capital to ambitious entrepreneurs without easy access. I'm glad that I can do a small part to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for a company that builds tests for women with breast cancer. Our products help doctors and patients pick the best treatment option (to minimize the likelihood of cancer recurrence)  for the patient based on doing an analysis of the tumor.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: By helping each other we can all achieve our dreams.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for a large public website in the UK.
I am also an acupuncturist.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Jace
lenders.loan_because: i have been to Africa several times working primarily with Athletes In Action, and have fallen in love with Kenya and her people. i am so pleased to find another way to bless friends in Kenya... through small entreprenurial loans
lenders.occupational_info: In my work i do marketing, communications & development for a fast growing construction company that is pioneering affordable home communities in Western Canada.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I like to share

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We're all riding this rock together

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the bountiful blessings of the Lord Jesus Christ.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with doctors to help people.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent people in court regarding family law issues, such as custody, spousal and child support, access to children, restraining orders.

lenders.name: Shasta
lenders.loan_because: My work is so local. This is my opportunity to stay connected to the global.
lenders.occupational_info: Advocate in local politics to protect natural areas and farmlands from development, and create communities with affordable housing, a variety of transit options, and good environmental quality.

lenders.name: Lisset
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with business people in need

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I'm expecting to make a big profit. This is a profit thing, right?

lenders.name: Leona
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone out in need. It feels good to be able to help someone else and it's a real honor.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a math teacher at an inner-city school. I don't make a lot of money, but I certainly make enough to be able to help some people.

lenders.name: Scott Wilder
lenders.loan_because: God calls us to be people of charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and the internet

lenders.name: davehunt00
lenders.loan_because: I respect the hard work the borrowers are doing and want to help them build their businesses and provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites like this one and help manage all the steps involved.

lenders.name: [UF] j.b and KS
lenders.loan_because: I was overwhelmed by requests from charities who just gave without the intent of helping people long-term, and when I gave to them they sold my name to others. I'd much rather support the "teach a man to fish" philosophy.
lenders.occupational_info: I run my own small business, where I manage and create websites like the one here, along with email servers and related systems.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I could have just as easily been born to a family and a country with a lower socioeconomic status than what I am fortune to have been.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to understand what goes on inside the human brain.

lenders.name: Lorien
lenders.loan_because: I want to try to make a difference. I am leading by example for my children, family, and friends.

lenders.name: Matt & Kym
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small teaching company.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: It's a cool idea.. love it!! Introduced to the scheme by my brother.. that's x-mas 07 sorted for all those awkward pressies, and someone out there can improve their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: IT support - working with voip solutions. Bit dull really : )

lenders.name: Joelle
lenders.loan_because: my brother gave me a KIVA gift certificate for christmas. What a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a midwife, working in Manitoba.

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.loan_because: It's cool watching people realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help fix people's telephones.

lenders.name: Pati and Mike
lenders.loan_because: We're convinced that the microloans can have a very direct effect on people's lives. Kiva really helps to make the world a smaller place.
lenders.occupational_info: Pati is an advice nurse. Mike teaches U.S. History in middle school.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because:
"Where you live should not decide whether you live or whether you die."
	-- Bono, "Crumbs From Your Table."


	The happenstance of birthplace has made me one of the wealthiest 1% of people in the world:  I'm a middle-class Mid-Western stay-at-home-mom.  Few of my peers would recognise themselves as such -- the average American suburbanite might be aware that they among the top 50% in the US, but when they think of "wealth" they think of Bill Gates and Donald Trump.  Compared to the top 0.001%, we in the top 1% may have a modest lifestyle -- but compared the other 99% of humanity we are rich beyond their wildest dreams. 

	Neither my wealth, nor another's poverty, has come to us in the vacuum of our own unaided acts.  Where we are born is the single greatest factor in deciding our lot in life.  I've been lucky, but I don't think I have ever shown the strength, determination and ingenuity of the entrepreneurs requesting loans through Kiva. I admire and respect these men and women -- and the least I can do as a moral person is to share with them some of the wealth that chance has given me. 


	"We are born to be killers, of plants if nothing else. And we are killed. It's a bloody business, living off others so that eventually they will live off you. Still, here and there in the food web one finds spaces where there's room for something more than just killing and being killed. 
	"Imagine the island of blue in the middle of a tropical storm, its eye of peace. 
	"You must admit that the hurricane is there. To do otherwise is self-deception, which in nature is fatal, or worse, hypocritical. Even honest, decent, generous folk must fight to survive when the driving winds blow. 
	"And yet, such folk will also do whatever they can, whenever they can, to expand the blue. To increase that gentle, centered realm where patience prevails and no law is made by tooth or claw. 
	"You are never entirely helpless, nor ever entirely in it for yourself. You can always do something to expand the blue." 
	-- David Brin, "Earth."

lenders.name: Verge
lenders.loan_because: I fully understand the challenges of funding a business and this is an opportunity for me to help someone. I like the Kive model and it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a construction company that specializes in remodeling and building out kitchens and bathrooms.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I love the stories and want to help out in any way I can; but most of all I want to support a system like this which I hope becomes more accepted and used.  Harnessing the power of online communities and at the same time have a direct impact on effecting people's daily lives on a global scale is a really cool thing that I want to be part of.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a very large technology company and manage a group of engineers who are working to make the web a more secure place,

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help end poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage databases.

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because: This system supports those with the entrepreneurial spirit in other countries, which lets them improve their own lives, in a means better than charity.

lenders.name: Georg Pagenstedt
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Mia and Michael
lenders.loan_because: we are going on a trip to Tanzania this summer in honor of Michael's 16th birthday.  We would like to give something back to the wonderful place we will visit.

lenders.name: Cindy & Dwhyna
lenders.loan_because: The money we save by not hiring professional photographers has GOT to go somewhere!
lenders.occupational_info: Feeding strays and sending out good Karma.

lenders.name: Bill & Mary Lou
lenders.loan_because: We have our own small business started with limited capital.  We believe that hard work and dedication can lead to success.  We have been blessed and want to help others reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a plastic distribution company specializing in high performance materials.  We purchase from mills around the world and resell to manufacturers in our local area.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the worth of people around the world, and I hope my children will as well.

lenders.name: Orsay
lenders.loan_because: world needs a radical change in the lifestyle, social status, most importantly in income levels, unfortunately we dont have that power to change everything drastically but a small step can change everything gradually.
lenders.occupational_info: i work as an accountant in construction business, not a dynamic work , needs lot of familarity with figures.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: Money needs to do something for people.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: God's grace allows me to do so, and because one person can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: events planning for a large ophthalmology/pharmaceuticals company

lenders.name: Brandon & Shawna
lenders.loan_because: We simply want to bless others as the Lord has blessed us.
lenders.occupational_info: Financial Advisor and Full-time Mom

lenders.name: Dimitris
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies with their computers.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: It's an opportunity to give to someone who really wants to build something for themselves.  They aren't just looking for a handout.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an excellent way to help active entrepreneurs who might otherwise be overlooked.

lenders.name: Righteousness Amuses Me
lenders.loan_because:
Life breaks everyone. Some get stronger in the broken places. - Hemingway

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6T2uBeiNXAo
lenders.occupational_info: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z7OzuXZ6U7s&feature=related

lenders.name: Mickey
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help making their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Judi
lenders.loan_because: I've been helped in the past and I'd like to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a self-employed health researcher.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I feel so lucky in my life; I have a job that pays well, and a wonderful husband and son, and I think this is such a great idea and chance to share with someone who's really working hard to make a better life for himself and his family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a technical translation service, we translate material such as crane service manuals and tractor safety decals into other languages, for equipment that's being sold overseas.

lenders.name: Trey
lenders.loan_because: "The American Dream" is not solely American.

lenders.name: Yoh&Natsuko
lenders.loan_because: We visited Kenya on our honeymoon and wanted to get involved with the people living there.
lenders.occupational_info: my wife&I work for a Japanese TV production company.it's an opportunity to encounter great people, ideas and experience.

lenders.name: Mr. Bitters
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It sounded like a nice thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a shoe store selling shoes

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the ability of microfinance to help hardworkers overcome the hardships and bring needed services to their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large insurance company.  My job involves buying needed materials and managing the company's computer systems.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I have worked in microfinance in Chicago and in Durban, South Africa and know that these loans make a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide small loans to diverse business owners in the Chicago land area.

lenders.name: Arun
lenders.loan_because: Kiva rocks!!

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: I believe Jesus Christ wants me to help others

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have the resources to be able to.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: This feels like an interesting way to assist others in improving their lives and their communities, rather than simply mailing a check to a charity or npo.
lenders.occupational_info: Day job, designing systems to make real estate transactions more efficient.  Side job, preparing music and humor audio and writing to make laughter more common.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I know I can make a difference in this world one Person at a time

lenders.name: Chris Canfield
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.  Some of us happened to be given a few chances, and it's our responsibility to spread those around.

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: I have a great life and I want to give back to others.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It is within my means to help others toward their goals.

lenders.name: Euisan
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: medical student

lenders.name: My_ma_&_ba
lenders.loan_because: Every time I make a loan, I send loving energies forward to Ma who is in Heaven now and Ba who lives in Singapore. Every loan is love sent by them and every loan sends love to them.
lenders.occupational_info: My life work is to serve. I haven't been able to do much of it in a very tangible way but I'd like to think that I try to every chance I get. Kiva has given me a much needed outlet to do exactly that. Good work, all at Kiva!

lenders.name: Scarlett
lenders.loan_because:
1. The UN, and by UN I mean the power-tool of the US, and it's branches aren't doing anything you could call fair or non-exploitive while keeping a straight face 
2. Lawrence Summers
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying at a liberal arts school to hopefully find a way to change the mindsets of capitalist Washington as well as those who choose to remain pleasently oblivious to the exploitation and evil that exists in this world market

lenders.name: webtutor
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good idea

lenders.name: Magne Rekdal
lenders.loan_because: Trust and partnerships bring the world small steps forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for users in the health care sector.

lenders.name: Hoke
lenders.loan_because: Capitalism is the only form of true sustainable development

lenders.name: Christophe
lenders.loan_because: People need money.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, program and implement software in support of the business needs of my clients. It's an area where I can be truly creative without otherwise having any artistic talent.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: we should all help out when we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Research and development microbiology

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the inherent abilities of us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-governmental organization that contributes to grassroots programs all over the world.  I am also a student of microfinance and resource creation.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: It's a gift that keeps on giving.  I enjoy seeing people succeed around the world.

lenders.name: Bethel Youth Group
lenders.loan_because:
We care and we can.
It's a small amount of money to help someone get a better life.
We have money and we care!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a Mennonite youth group from Winnipeg, Canada.

lenders.name: YBP Guide
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is a gift taught from the Bible. I feel honored to 'teach men to fish', instead of just giving them fish.
lenders.occupational_info: We have discussions, online, about the impact and social relevance of being Black in America.

lenders.name: Roberts-Gaal family
lenders.loan_because: this is a way to get our kids directly involved in helping others.

lenders.name: Diane & Steve
lenders.loan_because: Hoping to make a small difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Gian Mario
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people to reach serenity and independance.

lenders.name: Julie Roberts
lenders.occupation: We Sell the Genuine Four Leaf Clover Accessories
lenders.loan_because: We want to bring good luck to those in need and also to contribute back into the community. We help by planting seeds which can possibly spring forth into life-sustaining plants for these entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: Many customers have been touched after getting our clovers and have come back telling us that they have good luck in their jobs, careers, relationships as well as lottery. Similarly, we also would like to help out those in the third world countries by providing what help we can by helping aspiring businesses grow.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: how can I not?  There is so much need.

lenders.name: Stephanie & Andrew
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I have been blessed to have had good opportunities in life; we'd like to help others find their way in life too.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organizations develop policies and practices that make working for a company rewarding for its employees and profitable for the company.

lenders.name: Lang
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes a little makes all the difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make high strength polymer-based thin films and measure its physicial and chemical properties using scattered laser light.

lenders.name: Ric
lenders.loan_because: I have so much in comparison to most of the world's population.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research to prevent obesity in children.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I believe in non-governmental solutions.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of programmers who create software for the internet.

lenders.name: lauren
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to empower people and to really help change someone's life for the better. I know people helped me along the way and i want to do the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a large restaurant in downtown tokyo

lenders.name: Doug & Giselle
lenders.loan_because: We want to show our kids how to be part of a larger world outside of the US.  And we really want to help!
lenders.occupational_info: Doug works for a technology company in the US and writes books.  Giselle is an artist.

lenders.name: Seth Mowshowitz
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the world’s financial system is the main contributing factor to global inequality. Kiva helps to mitigate this situation by preventing investment capital from being captured within the system. The result is that individuals and small businesses from deprived areas who need loans to thrive can request and receive loans successfully and without exploitation.
lenders.occupational_info: As a designer my philosophy is user-centred. As a musician I focus my efforts on developing the language of a movement towards social equality.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to support someone who has the courage to run their own business, despite the difficulties.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and truly believe that every little bit helps.  =)

lenders.name: Ray & Cindy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a community library in a semi-rural area of Colorado.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I strongly support what Kiva is doing to elevate the life situations of entrepreneurs in developing countries...plus my sister works for Kiva and the whole team is awesome!
lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs achieve their goals and promote international trade development

lenders.name: Gjagiello
lenders.loan_because: I realize that the amount I spend on lunch in a week here in San Francisco could probably start a business in other parts of the world. Credit has helped me, and now that microlending has proven itself, I'm happy to help others improve their situation.

lenders.name: ET Evans
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a farmer in colorado, usa.

lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Executive in an international capital markets firm.  Banking for big companies.

lenders.loan_because: We at Sherpani look for ways to give back!
lenders.occupational_info: Breathe | Give | Stretch | Go - Lifestyle Bags for Women

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others set up a sustainable infrastructure for their business and economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for major technology companies by promoting their business to various forms of media (newspapers, magazines, websites, etc).

lenders.name: World Wings Miami
lenders.occupation: philanthropic former Pan Am flight attendants
lenders.occupational_info: The mission of World Wings International Inc. is to unite former Pan American World Airways flight attendants in order to promote philanthropic, civic and cultural activities through our special friendships.

lenders.name: barbara
lenders.loan_because: I know it makes a difference and it makes me feel great

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I am so thankful for the opportunities and freedom experienced as a female in the United States.  This is my way of giving back.

lenders.name: Allegra
lenders.loan_because: build a family business, build a better community.  Build a community, build a country.  Build a country, build a better world.

lenders.name: Cecilia
lenders.loan_because: I know that starting and growing a business is a challenging endeavor .  I believe that every entrepreneur deserves the opportunity to achieve success and  it makes me feel good to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a company that sells attraction passes to tourists

lenders.name: Federica
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the best way to help people help themselves, with the dignity given by their own job. I hate banks!Banks are ruining the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I run my own business in Tuscany, Italy. My country is not really rich and I am not rich either, but I try to keep up with what I think I am and can do. I work in the field of communication. I have a 10 years old son. I love the sea shore and the colors.

lenders.name: d64editor.com
lenders.loan_because: There are other people in the world that can make better use of a relatively small amount of money than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist with maintaining a medium sized computer network.

lenders.name: Tom and Meg
lenders.loan_because: We are passionate about development and convinced there is enough wealth in this world for everyone to have a fulfilling, healthy life. What's spare change to us can be life-changing to others.

lenders.name: Anita Grant Ltd

lenders.occupational_info: Anita Grant Ltd is a family owned business. Providing natural & organic  hair care & skin care goodies.

lenders.name: Gopinath
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who have the confidence of succeeding, if given right opportunities and resources. Kiva provides such a great opportunity connecting us with the people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an industry which creates software solutions to enable business processes for a large Company with a complex business model.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I know what a privilege it is to have good work opportunities, and I think everyone in the world should have them too.

lenders.name: Mia
lenders.loan_because: this is a great site-- so much opportunity to help

lenders.name: Sierra
lenders.loan_because: I've been so fortunate to have strangers invest in my education and future, and I'm working to give it back.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: When I've traveled to impoverished areas, I have seen the need for this type of lending. I love the community aspect of Kiva and the fact that my initial donation can just keep on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: painter, potter, graphic artist, herbalist

lenders.name: Elliott
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able so say have have helped someone else in need!

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: It helps people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I make all the financial transactions for my company and maintain records.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: To repay what others have given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying agriculture, trying to understand how we can produce enough food for ourselves, while still protecting our land for the future.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.

lenders.name: The Riley-Burnett Family
lenders.loan_because: We all share the same hopes and desires, to take care of our families and be safe and happy.  We hope that our small loans help the people who receive them accomplish their dreams.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: Helping others to a better life is both easy and rewarding
lenders.occupational_info: I repair electronic equipment in the aviation field.  Now retired I spend my time repairing and riding bicycles

lenders.occupational_info:
I am a software consultant that helps explore my clients needs and then implement the actual software. Currently I am working on these projects: 
a webcasting system, a pets registration website, EMIS (education management information system)

lenders.name: Garnet
lenders.occupational_info: Office work

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: I feel as though this is the least I can do for my fellowmen.  I am currently limited in what I am able to contribute to society and God's Kingdom right now. So, this is a simple and amazing chance to step in and help out.

lenders.name: whitney
lenders.loan_because: i believe that "to whom much is given, much is expected"
lenders.occupational_info: my hope is that i will be a stepping stone  in the life of a child whose education will break their cycle of poverty

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: my retirement plan
lenders.occupational_info: Physician

lenders.name: Ariel
lenders.loan_because: I think it's good to help other help themselves. I'm not giving handouts, but handups. My Ethics teacher told me about this website during our discussion on Obligations to the Poor.

lenders.name: Ed
lenders.occupational_info: I try to encourage people to ride public transit or find other ways of getting to work rather than riding in a single-passenger automobile.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: Loans and investments are the ladders that people use to improve their lives.  I needed loans earlier in my life, and I owe my success partly to them.  So it's natural for me to want to give some of that back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to enforce laws that protect the environment in Southern California.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Seems like a good idea :)

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: These loans are the only true way that people in these types of situations are able to grow and improve their situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze data on websites

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Give someone a go
lenders.occupational_info:
Personal Development
Help individuals let go of emotional feelings that are holding them back from living their dream.

lenders.name: suresh
lenders.loan_because: To make this world a better place to live.
lenders.occupational_info: A computer programmer.

lenders.name: Magnus
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people!
lenders.occupational_info: Right now i'm studying at the university so that i can become a history and religion teacher

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: it is exciting to see how my money can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a consultant with audits and label checks within the food industry.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help other people directly.

lenders.name: Devin
lenders.loan_because: I can. Thanks to the disparities in our global economy, a month's rent for me is a year's working capital for some hard working person. I can afford to skip a night out once in a while to let someone work toward their dream.

lenders.name: eleven:eleven coaching
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the comfort and security that comes from pursuing opportunities.  What could be better than helping enable others to achieve the same?  Those willing to work for their own dreams deserve every advantage to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to see how talented they are, and show them how to use their ability to make the world better for all of us.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It's so easy to help and such a small commitment that will make such a big difference for deserving entrepreneurs that how can you say no?!
lenders.occupational_info: I handle written communications for the president of a large environmental NGO.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.occupational_info: I study climate change and arctic sea ice

lenders.name: Razak
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is a powerful way to give the less fortunate a way to advance their life in a way they otherwise are unable to. The power of knowing you made your money and paid off your debts and made who you are yourself is undoubtably so much better than giving outright. This is the combination of the two.
lenders.occupational_info: Recent Grad at UW-Madison, currently working at a tech support job and in process of writing my first novel.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to open a used clothing store someday, so I wanted to help out someone with similar passions.

lenders.name: Ginny
lenders.loan_because: I believe in economic potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell makeup and hair products to stores to get them to sell them to their customers.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help others to reach their goals.

lenders.name: jani
lenders.loan_because:
"Be the change you want to see in the world."

Gandhi

lenders.name: Molli
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone should be given the chance to succeed in life regardless of where or when they were born. If we each do a little bit it will, in the end, make a big difference for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I act as a technical resource for the people I work with, write technical materials, and provide technical training for my company's employees.

lenders.name: Sonya
lenders.loan_because: a small amount of money in my eyes, based on the good life I have been given, can positively impact other lives around the world.

lenders.name: Magdalena
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Doctor in Medical Science, trainer of young ppl in leadership.

lenders.name: Ray J Ruddy III
lenders.occupation: Real Estate Finance and LED Lighting Sales.
lenders.loan_because:
Give a man a fish – he eats for a day.
Teach a man to fish – he eats for life and can feed others.
lenders.occupational_info: REAL ESTATE-FINANCE-LANDLORD-CONSTRUCTION-TECHNOLOGY-INVESTMENT-ENERGY

lenders.name: Christie
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing for me to do.

lenders.name: Ron J.
lenders.loan_because: People everywhere should have access to capital and the opportunity to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan conventions and special events for large corporations throughout the world

lenders.name: Jarrod
lenders.loan_because: I loan via Kiva.org because I believe in the responsibility of empowering others to lift themselves out of poverty by distributing wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create fundraising and advocacy e-mail campaigns for progressive non-profits and international relief organizations.

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: All people should have the chance to build a healthy and productive life.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It is a good way to help honest people better their lives.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I can and it's needed and the people I loan it to will create good things with it.  If I didn't help people with it, what would be the point of having money?
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for financial services companies.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: it's a great investment.
lenders.occupational_info: I make independent documentary films as well as corporate and nonprofit videos.

lenders.name: Preston & Heather
lenders.loan_because: We both support our local community and have been searching for a way to contribute outside our community where we can see the impact of our contributions.  Kiva gives us that opportunity to see where our money goes, and the ability to re-contribute the funds when they are paid back.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I love people ... and I love the creative and entrepreneurial spirit!
lenders.occupational_info: Fun and Rewarding, I design software applications

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in developing countries build better lives for themselves, their families, and their communities - and, from 2009, without promoting animal exploitation.

lenders.name: Lara
lenders.loan_because: I'm a job creator!

lenders.name: Al
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva loans are not charity.  "Give someone a fish." vs. "Teach someone to fish."  
The Kiva system is a win-win proposition, for both the lender and the lendee.
lenders.occupational_info:
I design and build custom applications for businesses that have special needs which can not be met by commercially available software.
   I do pro bono work for various non-profit organizations in my local area.
   As a Microsoft Access MVP, I volunteer my time on the Access newsgroups to answer questions from users from all over the world.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I want to put my money where my idealistic heart is. Kiva just helps my little corner of the world reach out to other corners in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies get thoughts and content into profitable websites.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: It's better to help people learn how to fish...

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because:
"The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit." 
By : Nelson Henderson

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: The bible says thou shalt be the lender and not the borrower. I believe in turning borrowers into lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a family owned Online retail store we call "The Peoples Seller" Deuteronmy 8:18

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I can. It's such a great way to make a little difference in this world. Isn't it cool what we can all do together.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company make sure they have enough employees to take care of business.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: Because a better question is why I don't lend. Plus, it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a software company that makes software for banks in the US.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
I think Kiva is a brilliant idea. Being in business myself, I understand how hard it is to grow a business even under good economic conditions. The challenges that the entrepreneurs on Kiva face are far, far, far greater and I applaud and greatly admire them all for their commitment, ambition and tenacity! I'll be doing my best to get other businesses involved.

I only wish I could lend to all of the entrepreneurs listed on Kiva!

Involvement in Kiva is also a great project for families; helping to raise and maintain our awareness of just how tough things can be for others and that we all have a responsibility to help where we can.  Each of my family is choosing an entrepreneur to lend to.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a renewable energy company in Australia that sells solar panels etc. and also provide marketing and ecommerce consultancy services; i.e. helping small businesses succeed on the Internet.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because:
I think that microcredit is a beautiful and powerful concept for helping the developing world, and it makes me very happy to make a demonstrable difference in the life of somebody who really needs it.

Also, microloans are very complicated, logistically speaking, and purely altruistic... If such a thing can succeed through kindness and creativity, it will confirm my best suspicions about the human race.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student studying computer science. I hope to one day design video games.

lenders.name: kirian
lenders.loan_because: I want to try theother side of life because I believe success in lifedependson how you succeed tostrike an equilibrium between accademics ans business.I have been doing business and schooling at the same time. And now that I have reach the point that I wanted,I want to concerntrate on business.
lenders.occupational_info: Being a student and blending with business is something I very much admired because the knowlegede acquired helps you in your busness which of course makes it easy forme to handle it well.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in a single parent household whose income was always hovering around the poverty line. But because we lived in North America, my siblings and I have had opportunities children of poor families in other countries have not. I want to do whatever I can to help parents in other parts of the world with lower incomes provide for their children and ultimately give them some of the opportunities they deserve.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Law Clerk and I assist Lawyers at my firm with their preparation for high profile law suits.

lenders.name: Planet Botanicals
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help local entrepeneurs and make a direct impact in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Manufacturer of natural and fair trade certified skincare using ingredients from around the world; committed to the principles of fair trade and sustainability.

lenders.name: GreenTara
lenders.loan_because: We feel very blessed in our lives.
lenders.occupational_info: May the merits from our positive activities in all our lives be dedicated to all beings, for now and eons to come.
